Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Extends the authorization of the town of Cornwall in Orange county to impose a hotel and motel tax
Summary: Extends the authorization of the town of Cornwall in Orange county to impose a hotel and motel tax by three years.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 283 of the laws of 2023, amending the tax law relating to authorizing the town of Cornwall to impose a hotel and motel tax, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
